provider.name: Cohere
provider.description: Cohere allows developers and enterprises to build LLM-powered applications.

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Cohere using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Cohere and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Cohere API key from the Cohere website [here](https://dashboard.cohere.com/api-keys).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for command-r-plus chat completions call on Cohere using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for command-r-plus chat completions call on Cohere using virtual key
